Easy to play, incredibly hard to master. Stays challenging and very stable. Awesome game.

you need to learn how to play you cant just be the best, so if you put in the time you can become really good. the dumb thing is the trust factor system. trust factor is a good thing because the legit players that wants to win and improve doesn't have to play with hackers and toxic players but the way trust factor work is dumb because if you are better people will report you just because the get mad and then you lose trust factor and it becomes hard to rank up and meet players with the same skill as yourself
